backend/main.mo: Defines the actor canister’s core data models for blueprints, posts, users, tasks, milestones, ownership records, and storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of multiple frontend files across pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark mode OKLCH color variables and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all primary routes, global layout, loading screen, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: UI component showing live connection state, success, retry, and error banners for backend connectivity.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication controls, navigation menu, and sign‑in prompts for gated actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, connection status, tab navigation, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Displays an animated loading screen with timed fade-out and calls onComplete afterward.
frontend/src/components/OfflineModeNotic: Shows an alert indicating the user is offline and data will be saved locally.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with username and bio, submitting via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/SignInPrompt.tsx: Dialog prompting users to sign in via Internet Identity with feature highlights and error handling.
frontend/src/components/StepBasedBluepri: Complex builder UI for creating step-based blueprints with editable steps, blocks, themes, and publishing flow.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: Renders the top tab navigation bar with icons and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyTimeline.t: Displays a week-based progress timeline showing phases and milestones up to the selected week.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance using react-query, refreshing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorConnection.ts: Tracks actor connection state, retries, and errors, providing connection status indicators based on useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarData.ts: Fetches project blueprints created by the current user and provides a mutation to toggle local task completion state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, exposing identity, login, and logout while loading and validating stored delegations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple data-fetching and mutation hooks for profiles, posts, and other backend resources with demo-data fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestMode.tsx: Empty placeholder file for future Test Mode logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for themes, including light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/calendarTasks.ts: Generates derived tasks from blueprint blocks and manages task completion via localStorage with parsing helpers.
frontend/src/lib/demoData.ts: Provides demo-mode helpers along with mock users and posts used when the backend is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/demoInteractions.ts: Implements local-only likes, comments, and purchases for demo posts and blueprints using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localPublishedBlueprint: Manages storing, serializing, and retrieving locally published blueprints in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/taskCompletionStorage.t: Stores and toggles enabled blueprint preferences for calendar tasks in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind and class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays blueprint details and handles purchases, reviews, and demo-mode logic based on ownership.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Shows a task calendar that derives daily tasks from owned blueprints and lets users toggle completion.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Renders a chat interface with sign‑in gating and tabs for direct and group messages, showing placeholder states when empty.
frontend/src/pages/ChecklistsPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Provides search across posts and blueprints, displays trending topics, and includes navigation to the marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed with post creation, likes, comments, and demo interaction support, with sign‑in restrictions for actions.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page highlighting platform features and prompting users to start building a blueprint.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Shows searchable and sortable marketplace blueprints with purchase handling for both real and demo items.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/MyBlueprintsPage.tsx: Shows a user's created and purchased blueprints with sign‑in gating and offline handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Renders a notifications list using mock data, handling authentication, profile setup, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with follow/unfollow actions, authentication checks, loading states, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/StudioPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated blueprint creation interface with a step-based builder and prompts for sign-in or profile setup.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for user profiles, posts, comments, blueprints, themes, and reviews.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theming, colors, animations, and plugin integration for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema and a detailed list of existing features covering authentication, actor setup, RBAC, routing, profile management, social features, marketplace, blueprint studio, calendar logic, and backend utilities. Serves as a comprehensive snapshot of current app capabilities for planning.
